tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Revenue_Report (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE,
    revenue DECIMAL,
    profit_margin DECIMAL,
    customer_retention DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE business_performance (
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id INT,
    margin_id INT,
    retention_id INT,
    performance_score DECIMAL
);
